spec_data.Name: perl-XML-Validator-Schema
spec_data.Description:
This module allows you to validate XML documents against a W3C XML Schema.
This module does not implement the full W3C XML Schema recommendation
(http://www.w3.org/XML/Schema), but a useful subset.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 06:45:18 PM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Validate XML against a subset of W3C XML Schema
